sense.name: 团体﹐公司, organizations, groups
sense.commentary:
text not found in stamplite.
A group whose members work together for a shared purpose in a continuing way.
sense.examples:
学术组织 academic organization
世界贸易组织 World Trade Organization (WTO)
群众组织。 mass organization.
他们参加组织生活 They had regular activities of an organization.

sense.name: 生物组织﹐ aggregate of cells, tissues, structures
sense.commentary:
text not fund in stamplite.
A group of related cells that forms larger parts of animals and plants.
sense.examples:
结缔组织 connective tissue
加玛射线可能会伤害基因组织。 The gamma rays may damage genetic tissues.
神经组织 Nerve tissue.
他研究组织疗法已多年。 He studied tissue therapy for several years.
